name: gel-typography
description: A flexible code implementation of the GEL Typography

scripts.test: node-sass test/test.scss test/test.css --output-style=expanded --sourcemap=none && diff -u test/test-expected.css test/test.css
scripts.dist: node-sass src/gel-typography.scss dist/gel-typography.min.css --output-style=compressed --sourcemap=none && node-sass src/gel-typography.scss dist/gel-typography.css --output-style=expanded --sourcemap=none

author: BBC
